author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
My tips and recommendations for collecting Tolkien books on a budget!

UK Editions at Blackwells: https://www.blackwells.co.uk?a_aid=nerdoftherings
(If you're looking for the UK editions of Tolkien books, I recommend Blackwells.  They do a much better job of packing their books than AmazonUK so they don't arrive damaged.)


Find all the US Editions discussed in the video here: https://amzn.to/414PJbL

Individual Links:
The Hobbit paperback: https://amzn.to/4hnZRSr
The Fellowship of the Ring paperback: https://amzn.to/42KbVsF
The Two Towers paperback: https://amzn.to/3ED5Zrm
The Return of the King paperback: https://amzn.to/410PvlS
The Silmarillion paperback: https://amzn.to/3CMa4cg
Unfinished Tales paperback: https://amzn.to/4gK6mhz

LOTR Collector's Edition Hardcover: https://amzn.to/40PcIpR
Poems of JRR Tolkien: https://amzn.to/412zFqL
LOTR Illustrated by the Author: https://amzn.to/3Q3eRt9
LOTR Deluxe Illustrated by the Author: https://amzn.to/4howWxL

Special thanks to Tolkien Co
title: Collecting Tolkien Books on a Budget
